channel.title: Shoveling on Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Shoveling on Docs

item.title: "The shovelers wanted to work undisturbed, so they bought the same computer for the meow!" Hahaha
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Shovelman: Well, Your Holiness, now that you have your own computer, don’t interrupt my work! Shovel: You use your own computer! Meow: Uh…. You’re not fooling me, are you, shoveling shit? Meow: What else does this thing do but take selfies?
